TopicTitle: Wider Runway lights etc. at KSC

Articles.Content:
I would like to have slightly wider runway with navigation lights . if you have ever seen how looks airport in the night, the KSC runway is rather dark (and whole KSC too). It is sometime pain to try to land large space planes to the strip, especially when you need flat approach angle, you can't clearly see beggining of the runway .

What is your opinion?

Chobot
